metadata.Title: CVE-2024-21907 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Newtonsoft.Json before version 13.0.1 is affected by a mishandling ofexceptional conditions vulnerability. Crafted data that is passed to theJsonConvert.DeserializeObject method may trigger a StackOverflow exceptionresulting in denial of service. Depending on the usage of the library, anunauthenticated and remote attacker may be able to cause the denial ofservice condition.

criterions.comment: newtonsoft-json: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
